features.title: AI Diagnostics
features.description: Automatically detect and highlight potential chest abnormalities with confidence scores and explainability overlays. Our AI models are trained on diverse datasets and validated in clinical settings.

features.title: Telehealth Integration
features.description: Secure video consults and scheduling built into the platform. Connect patients with specialists seamlessly.

features.title: Clinician Chat
features.description: Encrypted messaging for clinical collaboration and referrals. Share cases and insights securely.

features.title: Enterprise Integrations
features.description: DICOM, FHIR, PACS and SSO-ready. Seamlessly integrate with your existing healthcare infrastructure and workflows.

features.title: Advanced Analytics
features.description: Comprehensive dashboards and reporting tools to track patient outcomes, workflow efficiency, and diagnostic accuracy metrics.

workflowSteps.title: Upload Medical Images
workflowSteps.description: Securely upload chest X-rays through our HIPAA-compliant interface. Supports DICOM and standard image formats.

workflowSteps.title: AI Analysis
workflowSteps.description: Our AI models analyze images in seconds, detecting 14+ chest abnormalities with clinical-grade accuracy.

workflowSteps.title: Review Results
workflowSteps.description: View AI-generated insights with confidence scores, heatmaps, and detailed explainability overlays.

workflowSteps.title: Collaborate & Report
workflowSteps.description: Share findings with colleagues, generate reports, and document decisions in the integrated platform.
